__e: I cannot believe you're a member of the Russian mob!
You mean to tell me that for a full year you were on the run - from the Russian mafia?
You have friends in the Russian mafia?
But won't they be on that train tomorrow morning that's going to the Russian front?
You can accept what they give you, Schultz, or sue them and wait for the rest at the Russian Front.
Of course, what good is money gonna do you at the Russian front?
Just like you could have stopped him at the Russian Embassy. Butyou had a different agenda.
What the hell's happening at the Russian embassy?
Either you do as we ask, or I dump your ass at the Russian consulate, and they shoot you on the spot.
